about_the_game:
Keep Those Bugs Away From The Bomb is your ticket to a fast-paced bullet-hell adventure with heaps upon heaps of weapons, upgrades and unlocks.



Fight your way through waves of hideous enemies, rescue survivors, expand your roster of playable characters, add new weapons, and skills to your arsenal, and most importantly, where you’ll KEEP… THOSE BUGS… AWAY… FROM… THE BOMB!



KTBAFTB offers a virtually endless gameplay with ever-increasing difficulty. Unlock and wield dozens of weapons divided into four destructive categories: metal, fire, electric, and nuclear. Enhance them with various power-ups scattered throughout the levels to become the bullet- hell and KEEP… THOSE BUGS… AWAY… FROM… THE BOMB!

GAME FEATURES


  • A motley crew of playable characters to unlock
  • Dozens of skills and power-ups to upgrade your heroes
  • Variety of automated weapons that fire as you move around the levels
  • Tens of alien enemies with different behaviors and attack patterns
  • KEEPING THOSE BUGS AWAY FROM THE BOMB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 3570K or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Required to play in default graphical settings (LO-FI) and 1080p

short_description: Survive the swarm and clear the arena of alien infestation in this fast-paced bullet hell roguelite shooter. Unlock new heroes, guns, and skills in a never ending quest with one thing in mind. Keep Those Bugs Away From The Bomb!
